text:
We're attempting to embed the HubSpot knowledge base into an iframe within our application.
Results from the search bar are un-followable due to mixed content.
Root cause appears to be a 307 response from HubSpot to a non SSL URL.
We've been able to PoC work around this issue by forcing non SSL on the parent page and we no longer experiance this issue.
Obviously we want to maintain SSL across our application.
Has anyone encountered this issue?

Fixed:
<meta http-equiv="Content-Security-Policy" content="upgrade-insecure-requests"> in the parent
Hi! Have anyone tried to add information to a task with code? We need to assign the task to several persons and add a location.
Hello. When we create an external form, statistics (views, submissions rate) are not given. Is it a regular behavior?
